attributes.action: Gordon Brown is uniquely Unsuited to being the Prime Minister ...so please admit that and stand aside
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Gordon Brown has wasted billions on foolish vanity projects (his abolition of lower rate of tax) poor deals (the Millennium Dome, the increase in GPs pay for no corresponding increase in work) and appalling timing (selling half our gold reserves at an all time low price).  He lacks leadership, and respect, and should admit the above, and go ... now.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
